The seam-free freedom racerback bra by Champion provides comfort and ease of movement.

Imported
sports-bras closure
Machine Wash
IT’S ALL IN THE DETAILS – This women’s racerback sports bra offers moderate support, along with a knit-in mesh to provide cooling ventilation at neckline and front.
BUILT WITH COMFORT IN MIND – The racerback sports bra is made with a smooth, chafe-resistant band for day-long comfort.
ODOR-FREE FOR ALL DAY WEAR – Odor control helps keep the fabric of this racerback sports bra odor-free, so you stay fresh all day long, no matter what.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $13.57
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:15:30 UTC – Details)


PUMA – built for soft-support/mid-impact activity so you can keep consistent movement. Classic pull over style with a modern, comfort fit.

PUMA: construido para una actividad de apoyo suave/impacto medio para que puedas mantener un movimiento constante. Estilo clásico con un ajuste moderno y cómodo.

PUMA – Entwickelt für weiche Unterstützung / Mid-Impact-Aktivität, damit Sie konsistente Bewegungen beibehalten können. Klassischer Überziehstil mit moderner, bequemer Passform.

PUMA – בנוי לתמיכה רכה/פעילות בינונית כך שתוכלו לשמור על תנועה עקבית. סגנון משיכה קלאסי עם התאמה מודרנית ונוחה.

بوما – مصممة لدعم ناعم/ نشاط متوسط التأثير حتى تتمكن من الحفاظ على حركة ثابتة. تصميم كلاسيكي سهل الارتداء مع ملاءمة عصرية ومريحة.

PUMA – construído para suporte suave/atividade de médio impacto para que você possa manter o movimento consistente. Estilo clássico de vestir com um ajuste moderno e confortável.

PUMA – 专为软支撑/中冲击活动而设计,因此您可以保持一致的运动。 经典套头风格,现代舒适贴合。

PUMA – 專為軟支撐/中衝擊活動而設計,可保持一致的運動。 經典套頭式設計,現代舒適貼合。

푸마 – 부드러운 지지/중간 충격 활동을 위해 제작되어 일관된 움직임을 유지할 수 있습니다. 현대적이고 편안한 핏의 클래식 풀오버 스타일.

Item model number ‏ : ‎ PSP20W22021-001
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 4, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ PUMA
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08MQW4H8S

Imported
Pull-On closure
Wire Free
moisture wicking
adjustable straps
removable cups

About Us

Sport has the power to transform and empower us. To achieve that, the PUMA brand is based on the very values that make an excellent athlete.

Be Brave

We’re never afraid to take risks. We trust our instincts to make unexpected choices that push sport forward.

Be Confident

Whatever we do, we do with conviction. We make strong statements, we are bold and we believe in ourselves.

Be Determined

Nothing comes between us and realizing our dreams. We believe success is an endless pursuit to improve ourselves and how we play.

item.title: Under Armour Women’s Crossback Mid Impact Sports Bra
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Bras shouldn’t be complicated. They should be comfortable and they should be supportive. So we went straight to the source and asked real women how to make their favorite UA bra even better. And it worked. Delivers strategic support, tailored for medium-support activities like cycling, weight training & boxing. Soft, ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $17.17
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:21:04 UTC – Details)


Bras shouldn’t be complicated. They should be comfortable and they should be supportive. So we went straight to the source and asked real women how to make their favorite UA bra even better. And it worked. Delivers strategic support, tailored for medium-support activities like cycling, weight training & boxing. Soft, quick-drying cups provide extra structure & coverage with perforations for added breathability.Compression: Ultra-tight, second-skin fit. Removable cups have helpful R & L arrows to easily put back in. Crossover straps with updated keyhole detail for easier on/off. Updated interior construction helps keep pads in place—during wear & wash. Elastic band feels super-smooth & soft. Super-smooth, double-layer fabric delivers superior next-to-skin feel. Material wicks sweat & dries really fast & light. 87% Polyester/13% Elastane.
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 12.4 x 10.16 x 2.44 inches; 3.7 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 1361034
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ October 15, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Under Armour
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09JJYK83D

Imported
Pull-On closure
Machine Wash
Delivers strategic support, tailored for medium-support activities like cycling, weight training & boxing
Soft, quick-drying cups provide extra structure & coverage with perforations for added breathability
Crossover straps with updated keyhole detail for easier on/off

Women’s Armour Mid Crossback Sports Bra

Bras shouldn’t be complicated. They should be comfortable and they should be supportive. So we went straight to the source and asked real women how to make their favorite UA bra even better. And it worked.

  • Delivers strategic support, tailored for medium-support activities like cycling, weight training & boxing
  • Soft, quick-drying cups provide extra structure & coverage with perforations for added breathability
  • Removable cups with Right & Left labels
  • Crossover straps with updated keyhole detail for easier on/off
  • Updated interior construction helps keep pads in place—during wear & wash
  • Elastic band feels super-smooth & soft
  • Super-smooth, double-layer HeatGear fabric delivers superior next-to-skin feel
  • Material wicks sweat & dries really fast & light


Read more




Read more

HOW TO MEASURE

BAND SIZE: Standing straight up with an unpadded bra on, measure closely around the chest just under your arms, right above the bust. If your result is a fraction, round to the nearest whole number. (ex. 33.7” rounded to the nearest whole number, your band measurement is 34”)

BUST SIZE: While wearing an unpadded bra, loosely measure around the fullest part of your bust. Round to the nearest whole number. (ex. 34.5” rounded up to the nearest whole number, your bust size is 35”)

CUP SIZE: Subtract your final Band size from your final Bust size to find your Cup Size. (1″ difference = A Cup, 2″ B Cup, 3″ C Cup, 4″ D Cup 5″ DD Cup)

Fit Guide



Read more
